page.title: 12EXWICK FISH AND CHIP SHOP
page.content: Mr and Mrs Fryer own their own {family business}and open the shop when ever they like. They admitted they pinch chips when no_one is looking! Friday is a busy day because it is a{fish day}and Saturday is busy because people are shopping & fish & chips is an{easy meal.}Money is spent on fat,flour,fish,potatoes,salt, vinegar,bags,gas & electricity.Fish & chips cost about Â£1. They start work at 8.30am,peeling potatoes, cutting fish,making batter & making sure everything is in working order for opening at midday.They close at 1.45pm and clear up,order supplies & prepare for evening opening from 6_10.30pm. The shop opens from Tuesday to Saturday.They say their job is tiring but enjoyable.
